AdminLTE2 accordion container

Source: R/useful-items.R
accordion.Rd

Create an accordion container. Accordions are part of collapsible elements.

accordionItem creates an accordion item to put inside an accordion container.

accordion(..., id = NULL, width = 12)

accordionItem(..., title, status = NULL, collapsed = TRUE)

Arguments

...

text to write in the item.
id

Unique accordion id.
width

The width of the accordion.
title

item title.
status

item status. Valid statuses are defined as follows:

  • primary: #3c8dbc

  • success: #00a65a

  • info: #00c0ef

  • warning: #f39c12

  • danger: #f56954
collapsed

Whether to expand or collapse the item. TRUE by default. Set it to FALSE if you want to expand it.

Author

David Granjon, dgranjon@ymail.com

Examples

if (interactive()) {
 library(shiny)
 library(shinydashboard)
 library(shinydashboardPlus)
 
 shinyApp(
  ui = dashboardPage(
    dashboardHeader(),
    dashboardSidebar(),
    dashboardBody(
      accordion(
       id = "accordion1",
        accordionItem(
          title = "Accordion 1 Item 1",
          status = "danger",
          collapsed = TRUE,
          "This is some text!"
        ),
        accordionItem(
          title = "Accordion 1 Item 2",
          status = "warning",
          collapsed = FALSE,
          "This is some text!"
        )
      ),
      accordion(
       id = "accordion2",
        accordionItem(
          title = "Accordion 2 Item 1",
          status = "info",
          collapsed = TRUE,
          "This is some text!"
        ),
        accordionItem(
          title = "Accordion 2 Item 2",
          status = "success",
          collapsed = FALSE,
          "This is some text!"
        )
      )
    ),
    title = "Accordion"
  ),
  server = function(input, output) { }
 )
}
